[Thorough Research](/Feats.aspx?ID=1464) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

When you succeed at a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) check, you learn an additional fact about the subject. When you critically succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you can gain even more additional information or context than normal, at the GM's discretion.

<title level="2">Thorough Research leads to...</title>
[Just the Facts](/Feats.aspx?ID=1482)
